news.title: Putin will seek revenge for Ukraine drone attack, warns Trump
news.summary: Trump said his call with the Russian president was a "good conversation" but would not lead to  "immediate peace."

news.title: Gaza now worse than hell on earth, humanitarian chief tells BBC
news.summary: The situation in Gaza surpasses "any acceptable, legal, moral, and humane standard", the ICRC tells BBC's Jeremy Bowen.

news.title: Winter fuel payments to be reinstated this year as PM challenged over U-turn
news.summary: Rachel Reeves says more people will get winter fuel payment "this winter", but details over how many will get it remain unclear.

news.title: Ros Atkins on... The White House claims on BBC Gaza coverage
news.summary: White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt launched an attack on the BBC. She claimed that the BBC took down a story after reviewing footage. The BBC has said the claim is completely wrong and that it stands by its journalism.

news.title: Scammers stole Â£47m from HMRC in phishing attack
news.summary: The tax authority said it is writing to those affected to confirm they haven't lost any money and they don't need to do anything

news.title: Madeleine McCann search goes on but is it 18 years too late?
news.summary: Searches have resumed in Portugal nearly two decades after the three-year-old went missing.

news.title: Body found in search for stag party Scot missing in Portugal
news.summary: Greg Monks was reported missing in Albufeira last week after travelling to the resort for a stag party.

news.title: 200-year-old condom with explicit print displayed in Amsterdam
news.summary: The sheath is part of an exhibition on 19th Century prostitution and sexuality.

news.title: Eleven die in India crush as cricket fans gather for IPL victory parade
news.summary: Thousands of people lined the streets on Wednesday to welcome the Royal Challengers Bengaluru.

news.title: National Trust covers artwork referencing JK Rowling after tampering
news.summary: A campaigner removed stitching on an artwork which covered the Harry Potter author's name.
